firstTime.heading: If you are using this service for the first time
firstTime.intro: If you're the first person from your business to access this service, you'll be taken through the following steps. If you're not the first person from your business to access the service, you'll only need to complete steps 1 and 2.

step1.heading: GOV.UK One Login
step1.text: You must use the same email address that was provided during registration.

step2.heading: Defra account
step2.text: You'll need to set up a business account if you do not already have one. If none of the business types apply to you, choose the 'sole trader' option - it will not affect the way you use the service.

step3.heading: Digital service access
step3.text: If asked, you'll need to select 'Record reprocessed or exported packaging waste' from the list of available services.

step4.heading: Linking your account to its registration
step4.text: This will link your account to the original application we received.

insetText: Currently, you can only use this service to upload your {summaryLogLink}.

quickLinks.heading: Quick links
quickLinks.summaryLogsOverview: Summary logs for UK packaging waste: an overview

subheading: This service helps reprocessors and exporters meet UK packaging waste regulations.
